question: Read the given statements and choose the correct option: Statement I: In Calvin cycle, Carboxylation is catalysed by PEP Carboxylase. Statement II: In Hatch-Slack pathway, Carboxylation is catalysed by RuBP Carboxylase
options: Statement I is true but Statement Il is false
Both Statement I and Statement I are false
Statement I is false but Statement II is true
Both Statement I and Statement II are true
